channel.title: GitHub Trending - Ruby (Daily)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in Ruby nel periodo daily

item.title: 📝 Tommyboulianne/Web3-Minting-Platform (18 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: Tommyboulianne

📝 Repository: Tommyboulianne/Web3-Minting-Platform

📄 Descrizione: 🖼️ Web3-Minting-Platform: A decentralized application (DApp) for minting NFTs on a test network. A great introduction to Web3 dan smart contract development. ⛓️

⭐ Stelle: 18

🍴 Forks: 0

💻 Linguaggio: Ruby

📜 Licenza: No license

]]>
